message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $80 for it.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and sell the product to you for $120.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit, but $120 is still more than I had in mind. How about we split the difference again and settle on $100? That's the most I'm willing to pay.
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'll sell the product to you for $140.
